title: Exploring the Foundation of Cigars with Nick R. Agua
itunes:title: Exploring the Foundation of Cigars with Nick R. Agua
description:
This week we welcome the owner of Foundation Cigar Company Nick Melillo aka Nick R. Agua to the show and we discuss his company which makes cigars such as Charter Oak and Tabernacle which we will smoke, and we will discuss El Gueguense and the Upsetters.

It’s Labor Day weekend and we discuss our Labor of Love cigars with one of the most passionate owners in the business.

Join us live for the madness known as The Cigar Authority with your host David Garofalo, and co-hosts Mr. Jonathan and Barry Stein for the number 1 cigar podcast on the internet!

The Cigar Authority is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
